mapper.select: SELECT n.notice_id, n.notice_title, n.notice_type, n.notice_content, n.STATUS, n.create_by, n.create_time, n.update_by, n.update_time, n.remark, CASE WHEN r.id IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS isRead FROM sys_notice n LEFT JOIN sys_notice_read r ON n.notice_id = r.notice_id AND r.user_id = #{userId} WHERE n.status = 1 ORDER BY isRead ASC, n.create_time DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS unread_count FROM sys_notice n LEFT JOIN sys_notice_read r ON n.notice_id = r.notice_id AND r.user_id = #{userId} WHERE n.status = 1 AND r.id IS NULL
